entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening except freezing rain over southern sections. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy except freezing rain over southern sections early in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
